attributes.additional_details:
On the 10th April 2013 a young man Josh Thomas went missing after a night out with friends. Sadly his body was found and identified on the 30th April. His body was found in the river, which police believed he fell in. And before josh another young man sonny fell in and sadly died too. The barriers along Rochester river are not high enough, and I think something should be done about this.
Even though I never knew these young men, one day it may happen to someone I know or care about. Or even someone you know or care about too. So I am trying to stop it now before anyone else dies.
